short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight, security-first Chrome extension that helps you effortlessly track, manage, and restore your browsing history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Logger: Your ultimate browser history manager!

🌟 Key Features
Intuitive history tracking with powerful search and filters.
Save and restore tab groups effortlessly.

🔒 Privacy First
Works offline—your data stays on your device.
No tracking, no data collection.

⚡ Performance
Lightweight and fast with zero impact on browser speed.
Keyboard shortcuts and batch actions for quick control.

🛠️ Advanced Options
Import/export history as CSV files.
Customizable display with light/dark mode.

🚀 Coming Soon
Cross-browser sync and secure cloud backups.
Enhanced search with smarter filtering options.
